name: io.github.randybritsch/c4-mcp
title: Control4
description: Local Control4 home automation MCP server (lights, locks, thermostats, media).

environmentVariables.name: C4_CONFIG_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to a local config.json containing host/username/password.

environmentVariables.name: C4_HOST
environmentVariables.description: Control4 Director/Controller IP or hostname (overrides config host).

environmentVariables.name: C4_USERNAME
environmentVariables.description: Control4 account email (must be paired with C4_PASSWORD if set).

environmentVariables.name: C4_PASSWORD
environmentVariables.description: Control4 account password (must be paired with C4_USERNAME if set).

environmentVariables.name: C4_DIRECTOR_TIMEOUT_S
environmentVariables.description: Per-request timeout (seconds) for Director API calls.

environmentVariables.name: C4_GET_ALL_ITEMS_TIMEOUT_S
environmentVariables.description: Overall timeout (seconds) for full inventory fetches used by list/resolve operations.

environmentVariables.name: C4_ITEMS_CACHE_TTL_S
environmentVariables.description: Inventory cache TTL (seconds). Use 0 to disable caching.

environmentVariables.name: C4_STDIO_TOOL_MODE
environmentVariables.description: STDIO only: tool catalog mode. Use 'compact' to reduce tools/list payload size for clients like Claude Desktop; use 'all' to expose every tool.

environmentVariables.name: C4_STDIO_TOOL_ALLOWLIST
environmentVariables.description: STDIO only: comma-separated allowlist of tool names to expose in tools/list. Overrides C4_STDIO_TOOL_MODE when set.

environmentVariables.name: C4_STDIO_TOOL_DENYLIST
environmentVariables.description: STDIO only: comma-separated denylist of tool names to hide from tools/list.

environmentVariables.name: C4_STDIO_DEBUG
environmentVariables.description: STDIO only: when true, log JSON-RPC recv/sent diagnostics to stderr for troubleshooting.

environmentVariables.name: C4_WRITE_ALLOWLIST
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated allowlist of write tool names.

environmentVariables.name: C4_WRITE_DENYLIST
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated denylist of write tool names.
